pageContext.claim: “Steve was a staffer who worked for me after I had already won the nomination by defeating seventeen candidates.”
pageContext.analysis: Bannon formally joined the campaign after the convention but he had been advising Trump since early in the primary process. Bannon was far more than a "staffer." He served as campaign chairman and then chief strategist and senior counselor to the president. Plus, Trump even appointed him to the National Security Council until an outcry from national security professionals forced Trump to reverse course.
